com.appetizeapp.android.wheel.adapter

Class AbstractWheelTextAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appetizeapp.android.wheel.adapter.AbstractWheelAdapter
      • com.appetizeapp.android.wheel.adapter.AbstractWheelTextAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WheelViewAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdapterWheel, ArrayWheelAdapter, CounterWheelAdapter, LevelWheelAdapter, NumericWheelAdapter, RowWheelAdapter, SeatWheelAdapter, SectionWheelAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractWheelTextAdapter
extends AbstractWheelAdapter
    Abstract wheel adapter provides common functionality for adapters.
